pages.about: About Emerald Hotel - Our Story and Team | Luxury Hotel in India Contact About us Casino Welcome to the Emerald Hotel, where luxury meets heritage. Welcome to the Emerald Hotel, where luxury meets heritage. Founded with a vision of creating an unparalleled experience for our guests, the Emerald Hotel has grown into a symbol of excellence in the hospitality industry. Our journey began with a commitment to providing the finest accommodations and exceptional service. Over the years, we have meticulously crafted our hotel to be a haven of luxury and comfort, setting new standards in hospitality. Our restaurant, celebrated as one of the finest dining establishments in the region, offers an exquisite culinary journey that delights the senses. We take immense pride in our ability to provide a dining experience that is both memorable and delightful. At the Emerald Hotel, every guest is a valued individual. We approach every aspect of our service with genuine care and attention to detail, ensuring that your stay with us is nothing short of extraordinary. From the moment you step through our doors, you will experience the warmth and dedication that define our hospitality. Experience the Best of Emerald Hotel! Indulge in luxury and comfort at Emerald Hotel, where every detail is designed to provide an exceptional stay. From our spacious, well-appointed rooms to our world-class amenities, we ensure that every moment of your visit is memorable. Why Choose Us? Luxurious Accommodations: Relax in our elegant rooms and suites, designed for ultimate comfort. Fine Dining: Savor exquisite dishes at our renowned restaurant. Top-Notch Services: Enjoy our spa, wellness center, swimming pool, and fitness center. Convenient Airport Transfer: Arrive in style with our complimentary airport transfer service. Book Now and Unlock Exclusive Benefits! Enjoy all these services and more by booking your stay with us today. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, Emerald Hotel promises a stay filled with luxury, comfort, and unparalleled service. Reserve Your Room Our Team Our success is built on the dedication and expertise of our team. At the Emerald Hotel, we believe that our staff is our greatest asset. Each member of our team undergoes rigorous training to ensure that they are equipped with the skills and knowledge to provide exceptional service. We are committed to creating an environment where our guests feel comfortable and well-cared for. Our team’s commitment to excellence extends beyond the hotel’s walls. We offer a dedicated airport transfer service, ensuring a seamless and comfortable journey from the moment you arrive in India. Our chauffeurs are trained to provide a smooth and welcoming ride, reflecting the high standards of service that you can expect throughout your stay. Whether you are here for business or leisure, our staff is always at your service, ready to assist with any request. At the Emerald Hotel, we strive to create a home away from home, where every guest feels valued and every need is met with a smile. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Emerald Hotel Contact About us Casino Privacy Policy | Emerald Hotel Privacy Policy At Emerald Hotel, your privacy is of utmost importance to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website and utilize our services. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and other relevant details when you make a reservation, contact us, or subscribe to our newsletter. How We Use Your Information Your information is used to process reservations, respond to inquiries, improve our services, and send you promotional materials if you have opted in. We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal information. All sensitive data is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology and stored in secure environments. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. If you wish to exercise these rights or have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at emeraldhotel@gmail.com. Changes to This Privacy Policy Emerald Hotel reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on our website. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at emeraldhotel@gmail.com. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +9134254836452 E-mail: emeraldhotel@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Emerald Hotel Hotel
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | Emerald Hotel Contact About us Casino Terms and Conditions | Emerald Hotel Terms and Conditions Welcome to Emerald Hotel! By making a reservation with us, you agree to the following terms and conditions: 1. Reservations All reservations must be guaranteed with a valid credit card. The card will be charged for the first night upon booking. 2. Cancellation Policy Cancellations must be made at least 48 hours prior to your arrival date to avoid a cancellation fee equivalent to the first night's stay. 3. Check-in and Check-out Check-in time is from 3 PM, and check-out time is by 11 AM. Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. 4. Guest Responsibilities Guests are responsible for any damages to hotel property during their stay. Any damage will be charged to the credit card on file. 5. Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy. 6. Contact Us If you have any questions regarding these terms, please contact us at emeraldhotel@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing Emerald Hotel. We look forward to welcoming you! Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +9134254836452 E-mail: emeraldhotel@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Emerald Hotel Hotel
